H0.text: At which castle was Mary Queen of Scots beheaded. Edinburgh Castle

H1.text: At which castle was Mary Queen of Scots beheaded. Tower of London

H2.text: At which castle was Mary Queen of Scots beheaded. Windsor Castle

H3.text: At which castle was Mary Queen of Scots beheaded. Fotheringhay

A4.text: Mary was beheaded the following year at Fotheringhay Castle.
